objective.title: Phase 1: Core Architecture & Rule Content Parser
objective.description: Implement foundational architecture and rule content parsing capabilities

custom_requirements:
**Phase 1 Objectives:**
Establish the foundational architecture and implement core rule content parsing capabilities.

**Key Deliverables:**
1. Enhanced manage_rule tool architecture design
2. RuleContentParser implementation for JSON/MDC formats
3. Basic content validation framework
4. Enhanced MCP tool interface with new actions
5. Unit tests for core parsing functionality

**Technical Requirements:**
- Support JSON metadata parsing
- Support full MDC content parsing with frontmatter
- Implement content validation and format detection
- Design extensible architecture for future enhancements
- Maintain backward compatibility with existing actions

**Success Criteria:**
- Parse JSON rule metadata successfully
- Parse MDC files with YAML frontmatter
- Validate rule content against standards
- All existing manage_rule actions continue to work
- 90%+ test coverage for new functionality
